question: who's playing in the world series and when is it
vanilla_rag_result: The 2019 World Series will be played between the American League champion and the National League champion. The series will begin on October 22, 2019, with Game 7 scheduled for October 30, 2019. Other games are scheduled as follows: Game 4 on October 25, Game 5 on October 26, and Game 3 on October 27.
